name: Tea Merchant Cushion - Leaf Green
description:
The Lost Docks Cushion Collection is inspired by Liverpool and the UK’s maritime trading heritage and the vintage typography of the tea chests, flour and coffee sacks used to transport goods into the thriving ports of the early 20th century. The cushions blend contemporary design with a vintage twist and will add a cool, industrial vibe to any living space.

Our original designs are individually hand screen printed to order using eco-friendly water-based inks and are printed on 100% brushed cotton cushions, which are made in the UK. The cushion can be purchased with an optional plump luxury duck feather inner pad to provide maximum comfort for lounging and relaxing at home.

The modern heritage colour palette of slate grey, leaf green, burgundy wine and teal blue will add a pop of colour to enliven any room. Mix and match with a variety of colours to create a unique and eclectic look.

  • Printing:  Individually hand screen printed using eco friendly water-based inks in our Liverpool design studio
  • Material:  100% brushed cotton cushion cover – Made in the UK
  • Optional Cushion Inner pad:  100% duck feather pad – Made in the UK
  • Dimensions:  43 x 43cm Square with zip closure
  • Washing Instructions:  Machine washable inside out at 30 degrees. For best results, we recommend handwashing to retain vibrancy of colour.
